data.label: Qimei SDK
data.description: 提供终端设备的唯一标识 ID 体系服务，能精准的区分识别每一台终端设备，拥有海量的跨应用用户 ID 关系积累，以及实时的 ID 找回能力，应用于常规运营，结算场景。

data.label: Qimei SDK
data.description: Provides terminal device unique identification ID system services, capable of accurately distinguishing and identifying each terminal device, with massive cross-application user ID relationship accumulation, and real-time ID retrieval capabilities, applied to conventional operations and settlement scenarios.
